  • Read our latest article at The Conversation UK! (También en español)

    Read our latest article on why we shouldn’t use quinine nor cinchona bark to treat or prevent COVID-19. Great collaborative work with Kim Walker and Cassandra Quave. Also ¡versión en español!

  • New paper is out in press now!

    We found that historical chemical annotations of Cinchona bark collections (including quinine, used to treat malaria) are comparable to HPLC estimations. JEP 40 years.

    Read More

  • "Just the tonic: A natural history of tonic water is out!"

    “Discover tonic’s rich history which entwines a South American tree, medicine, empire and drink.” By Kim Walker and Mark Nesbitt. Join us to learn more about the history and chemistry of tonic water.
